name: personal-productivity-tracker
description: A full-stack personal productivity tracker application

scripts.install-all: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd tracker && npm run dev"
scripts.deploy-backend: cd backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.deploy-frontend: cd tracker && npm install && npm run build

author: Enock Mugishah
